colorspace: sRGB standard (with sYCC gamut) and Adobe RGB standard compatible with TRILUMINOS Color
exposurebracketing: 3 continuous or single shots in 1/3 or 2/3 EV steps
autoexposurelock: Yes (AE Lock button). Can be disabled from menu
creativestyle: Standard, Vivid, Neutral, Clear, Deep, Light, Portrait, Landscape, Sunset, Night Scene, Autumn Leaves, Black & White, Sepia, Style Box
pictureeffects: [Still Image] Toy Camera, Pop Color, Posterization, Retro Photo, Soft High- key, Partial Color, High Contrast Monochrome, Soft Focus, HDR Painting, Rich-tone Monochrome, Miniature, Watercolor, Illustration [Movie] Toy Camera, Pop Color, Posterization, Retro Photo, Soft High-key, Partial Color, High Contrast Monochrome
videoformat: XAVC S / AVCHD Ver. 2.0 / MP4 (MPEG-4 AVC (H.264))
mediatype: SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card; Memory Stick PRO Duo/Pro-HG Duo media
stillimagefileformat: JPEG (DCF Ver. 2.0, Exif Ver.2.3, MPF Baseline compliant), RAW (Sony ARW 2.3 format)
scenemodes: Anti Motion Blur, Fireworks, Gourmet, Handheld Twilight, High Sensitivity, Landscape, Macro, Night Portrait, Night Scene, Pet Mode, Portrait, Sports Action, Sunset
drangeoptimizer: Off, Dynamic Range Optimizer (Auto/Level 1-5), Auto High Dynamic Range
whitebalancemode: Auto / Daylight / Shade / Cloudy / Incandescent / Fluor (Warm White) / Fluor (Cool White) / Fluor (Day White) / Fluor (Daylight) / Flash / C. Temp., Filter / Custom
colortemperature: 2500 9900K with 15-step each Magenta/Green compensation (G7 to M7), Amber/Blue (A7 to B7), Custom
exposuresettings: [Still] Superior Auto, Intelligent Auto, Program Auto (Program shift available), Shutter Priority, Aperture Priority, Manual, Scene Selection, Movie, Sweep Panorama [Movie] Program Auto, Aperture Priority, Shutter Priority, Manual
